description: LEJ PP Search hooks - Redirects WebSearch to Perplexity tools for better discovery-based search

hooks.command: echo 'When asked to research or look up current information, use Perplexity MCP tools (perplexity_search, perplexity_ask, perplexity_research, perplexity_reason) instead of built-in WebSearch. Perplexity discovers new information rather than confirming existing knowledge.'
